heck.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: used to show that you are annoyed or to emphasize what you are saying
heck.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Oh heck! I’ve lost my keys!
heck.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: used like ‘hell’ to emphasize what you are saying
heck.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: It cost a heck of a lot of money.
He sure as heck didn’t tell me.
